verses.verse: These are the <S%H4550>journeys<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with their <S%H6635>armies<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> their goings <S%H4161>out<s%> according to their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> by the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and these are their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> according to their goings <S%H4161>out<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H6240%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>; on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H6453>passover<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> with an <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.

For the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> all their <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> among them: upon their <S%H430>gods<s%> also the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H864>Etham<s%>, which is in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H864>Etham<s%>, and turned <S%H7725>again<s%> unto <S%H6367>Pi-hahiroth<s%>, which is before <S%H1189>Baal-zephon<s%>: and they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4024>Migdol<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6367>Pi-hahiroth<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H864>Etham<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H4785>Marah<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4785>Marah<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H362>Elim<s%>: and in <S%H362>Elim<s%> were <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H5869>fountains<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, and threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> palm <S%H8558>trees<s%>; and they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> there.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H362>Elim<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin<s%>.
And they took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1850>Dophkah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H1850>Dophkah<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H442>Alush<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H442>Alush<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H7508>Rephidim<s%>, where was no <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H7508>Rephidim<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H6914>Kibroth-hattaavah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H6914>Kibroth-hattaavah<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H2698>Hazeroth<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H2698>Hazeroth<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7575>Rithmah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H7575>Rithmah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H7428>Rimmon-parez<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H7428>Rimmon-parez<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H3841>Libnah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H3841>Libnah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H7446>Rissah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H7446>Rissah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H6954>Kehelathah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>went<s%> from <S%H6954>Kehelathah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8234>Shapher<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8234>Shapher<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H2732>Haradah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H2732>Haradah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H4722>Makheloth<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4722>Makheloth<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H8480>Tahath<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H8480>Tahath<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H8646>Tarah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H8646>Tarah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H4989>Mithcah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>went<s%> from <S%H4989>Mithcah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H2832>Hashmonah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H2832>Hashmonah<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H4149>Moseroth<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4149>Moseroth<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H1142>Bene-jaakan<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H1142>Bene-jaakan<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H2735>Hor-hagidgad<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>went<s%> from <S%H2735>Hor-hagidgad<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H3193>Jotbathah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H3193>Jotbathah<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H5684>Ebronah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H5684>Ebronah<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H6100>Ezion-gaber<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H6100>Ezion-gaber<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%>, which is <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>, in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H4191>died<s%> there, in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4194>died<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6166>Arad<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5045>south<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H935>coming<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H6758>Zalmonah<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H6758>Zalmonah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H6325>Punon<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H6325>Punon<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H88>Oboth<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H88>Oboth<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H5863>Ije-abarim<s%>, in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H5864>Iim<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H1769>Dibon-gad<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H1769>Dibon-gad<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H5963>Almon-diblathaim<s%>.
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H5963>Almon-diblathaim<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.
And they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, from <S%H1020>Beth-jesimoth<s%> even unto <S%H63>Abel-shittim<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.
Â¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, When ye are passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>;

Then ye shall drive <S%H3423>out<s%> all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> all their <S%H4906>pictures<s%>, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> all their <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H6754>images<s%>, and quite pluck <S%H8045>down<s%> all their high <S%H1116>places<s%>:
And ye shall <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> the inhabitants of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein: for I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

And ye shall <S%H5157>divide<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> among your <S%H4940>families<s%>: and to the <S%H7227>more<s%> ye shall give the <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and to the <S%H4592>fewer<s%> ye shall give the <S%H4591>less<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: every man's inheritance shall be in the place where his <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>falleth<s%>; according to the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> ye shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%>.

But if ye will not drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you; then it shall come to pass, that those which ye let <S%H3498>remain<s%> of them shall be <S%H7899>pricks<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H6796>thorns<s%> in your <S%H6654>sides<s%>, and shall <S%H6887>vex<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein ye <S%H3427>dwell<s%>.
Moreover it shall come to pass, that I shall <S%H6213>do<s%> unto you, as I <S%H1819>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them.
